page.title: 14VIEWS OF WARTON RESIDENT 1
page.content: MRS.BAUM-PICK. There are four shops in Warton a drapers,a green grocer,a butchers and a{Post Office}.In addition we have we have a mobile library,baker,milkman,fresh fish van and a mobile fish and chip van.The village has one telephone box,two post boxes with two collections each day except at weekends.There are three public houses,one working mens club,one church and one health and fitness club.Holy Trinity{Church}was built in 1840.It was the brainchild of the then vicar of{Polesworth}the reverand William Palmer.The parochial church council have been very active during the last two years,decorating the church themselves.The churchyard is a source of pride and is widely admired by visitors.The other{clubs within the village include Women's Institute and Women's Club
